attributes.action: Suspend council tax in the constituency of Eastleigh
attributes.additional_details: The corona virus is putting considerable financial strain on households in this constituency. People need support financially to mitigate the loss of earnings they face due to actions by employers to limit working hours, pay and other income streams.
attributes.background: Pass legislation and provide associated funding to facilitate the suspension of council tax for residents in the Eastleigh constituency

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
